card_name: Armityle the Chaos Phantasm (Updated from: Armityle the Chaos Phantom)
card_text: "Uria, Lord of Searing Flames" + "Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder" + "Raviel, Lord of Phantasms"$NMust first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control. (You do not use "Polymerization".) Cannot be destroyed by battle. Gains 10,000 ATK during your turn only.
note: Card Name updated from "Armityle the Chaos Phantom" on July 10, 2020.
